game_description: Welcome to Sep's Diner, the new burger restaurant of which YOU are the Chef! Will it really become the best burger in town? It's up to you now! Level after level, your experience will increase as well as the number of your gourmet customers. They are in a hurry, so make it quick to satisfy them before they leave! Hungry and impatient, they won't let you make a mistake... Be attentive and precise, to make the best possible profit! Including a brand new UI and weekly challenge! Game Features : Â· 3 restaurants Â· 4 game modes included : Timed, Relaxed, Infinite, Multiplayer Â· 27 levels included per restaurant (12 for timed/relaxed, 3 for Multiplayer) Â· Co-op multiplayer up to 4 players Â· Intense and thrilling levels! Â· Immersive audio ambiance Â· Impatient customers with fun voices Â· Beautiful scenery and colored lights Â· Increasing difficulty level after level Â· More than 30 different combinations for burgers recipes! Â· Burgers, Kebabs, Pancakes, donuts, waffles, ice creams and more!
review_1: Overcooked in VR! This one is a bit better than cook-out and better for solo players imo. But also fun with a friend! Absolutely worth full price. Or get it 25prcnt cheaper: b i t , l y / s e p s d i n e r

review_4: I love this game, but I believe there is a glitch in the kebab truck. Every time someone asks for two strawberries, a banana, and two strawberries - it says wrong recipe! I have no idea what Iâ€™m doing wrong. Iâ€™ve delivered it raw, grilled, and with just a grilled banana and raw strawberries but itâ€™s always wrong! The same thing happens with the strawberry and pink marshmallow recipe. The picture looks grilled. I grill it, but it always says â€œwrong recipe.â€ Maybe you could add a recipe book to the game so players can refer to that for the recipes! I donâ€™t know. That aside, this game is a lot of fun! I love it! It would be cool if you added more restaurants!
review_5: It's a pretty cool cooking game. I just loved it! The challenges are cool, the movements are pretty realistic and you feel like cooking for real. You can move yourself inside the kitchen to pick all ingredients and use the equipments. It's only difficult to find others online to play multiplayer. But anyway it already worth for single player mode. The detail is that the game was designed to use walk through a fair amount of space. If your space to play is more limited, you can teleport with the control but the experience is not equal and you take more time. Anyway, a great game. So cool! I recommend to anyone.
